item.title: Paris-based AI voice startup Gradium nabs $70M seed
item.description: Gradium, a startup spawned out of French AI lab Kyutai (backed by French telecom billionaire Xavier Niel), launched out of stealth on Tuesday.

item.title: What does it mean when Uncle Sam is one of your biggest shareholders? Chip startup xLight is about to find out
item.description: You can imagine how this is all going over in Silicon Valley, where the libertarian ethos runs deep.

item.title: Apple just named a new AI chief with Google and Microsoft expertise, as John Giannandrea steps down
item.description: His replacement is Amar Subramanya, a highly regarded Microsoft executive who spent 16 years at Google, most recently leading engineering for the Gemi...

item.title: One of Googleâ€™s biggest AI advantages is what it already knows about you
item.description: The promise is AI that's uniquely helpful because it knows you. But the risk is AI that feels more like surveillance than service.

item.title: Zillow drops climate risk scores after agents complained of lost sales
item.description: The move is a loss for homebuyers, who through Zillow had ready access to a property's climate risk scores from First Street.
